Agreed.Cliche` driven plot,wooden characters and cheesy one liners don't make avatar a movie that's worth 2 golden globes,especially best motion picture and best director but I won't say I didn't enjoy it for what it was,a visual spectacle and nothing more.If I would have seen it at home instead of the cinema I would have thought much much less of it.Also I think it's gonna win an oscar for FX which is fine by me but it's incredibly overrated.
